title: Pixel 3XL with Android version 11 "Use System certificates" menu disable
content:
Hello There

Is anyone knows why the phone "Use system certificates" menu disabled? Alternatively, How Can I enable the menu?


After upgrade version 11, the phone can not authenticate with WPA2 Enterprise mode "Do not validate" option. so try to use a certificate, However the menu itself, not able to choose. Greyed out. 

I also test with Samsung S20 and Andriod 11/One UI 3.0, it can choose a "Use system certificates" option, it works fine. 

Thanks
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
